items.title: Why one trauma doctor sees self-driving cars as a 'public health breakthrough'
items.description: NPR's Ailsa Chang speaks to Dr. Jonathan Slotkin about the new data released by Waymo about accidents and their self-driving cars.

items.title: Amputees often feel disconnected from their bionic hands. AI could bridge the gap
items.description: Sensors and artificial intelligence help a prosthetic hand act more like a natural one, new research shows.
